title: Effect of combined use of supplementary irrigation, manure and P fertilization on grain yield and profitability of soybean in northern Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): J.F. Bebeley, A.Y. Kamara, J.M. Jibrin, A.I. Tofa, R. Solomon, N. Kamai
